card.name: Tender Goatress
card.text: Flash Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.) --- (Back): Effalen Tinderwolf

card.name: Effalen Tinderwolf
card.text: If a spell would resolve, instead counter it unless its controller pays two life for each other spell they've cast this turn. Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.) --- (Front): Tender Goatress

card.name: Hand In Hand
card.text: Creatures you control have soulbond. (Unpaired creatures may pair as either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) Whenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you control and could target another creature paired with it, copy that spell. The copy targets the other creature.

card.name: Dewdrop Strawman
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 blue Bird Illusion creature token with flying. When Dewdrop Strawman becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it and each Illusion token you control. You gain 1 life for each token sacrificed this way.

card.name: Grudge Scavenge
card.text: Exile any number of target artifacts with total mana value twice X or less. For each artifact exiled this way, create a 0/1 red Alien Beast creature token with prowess and "This creature can't block alone."

card.name: Oth'teva Conservationist
card.text: When this creature enters or dies, return target permanent card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand. Reprocess (If this dies, shuffle it from its owner's graveyard into their library. Look at the top two cards, then put one into their graveyard.)

card.name: Treachery Unveiled
card.text: Target player separates the attacking creatures they control into two piles. Choose one of those piles. Untap each creature in that pile and gain control of those creatures until end of turn.

card.name: Smokeshawl Penitent
card.text: Menace, reach Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, put an echo counter on it. (For each echo counter this dies with, you may choose an ability that would trigger to trigger an additional time.) When this creature dies, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Megni's Fervent Plea
card.text: (You may cast a legendary instant only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.) Choose X— • This spell can't be countered. • Exile target attacking creature. • Target player can't lose life this turn. • Put this spell onto the battlefield transformed and attached to target creature you control. --- (Back): Megnificient, the Witchblade

card.name: Megnificient, the Witchblade
card.text: Equipped creature has first strike, lifelink, and "Whenever this creature deals damage to a permanent, that permanent loses indestructible until end of turn." Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.) --- (Front): Megni's Fervent Plea

card.name: Aenin's Journaling
card.text: At the beginning of each main phase during your turn, you may exile a permanent card from your graveyard. If you do, add {C} or one mana of any of the exiled card's colors. Otherwise, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Crippling Snare
card.text: Put two stun counters on target creature. For as long as that creature has a stun counter on it, it has "When this creature is dealt damage, destroy it." (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.) Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Regisaur Packmate
card.text: Trample, haste Enrage — Whenever this creature is dealt damage, create a 3/2 green Dinosaur creature token that can't block.

card.name: Cryptosleep Reliquary
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control becomes tapped, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, draw a card. {1}{U}, {T}: Tap target creature, then scry 1.

card.name: Efface
card.text: Exile target artifact, enchantment, or token.

card.name: Ramshackle Renegade
card.text: Whenever another creature or artifact you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Revolt — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Clouds' Dominion
card.text: Whenever you attack, scry X, where X is the greatest power among attacking creatures you control. Then if X is 9 or greater, exile this enchantment and take an extra turn after this one.
